name: Samuel H. CONOVER and Rebecca Conover, Husband and Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner

parties: Samuel H. CONOVER and Rebecca Conover, Husband and Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated in light of Snyder v. Harmon, 522 Pa. 424, 562 A.2d 307 (1989). The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Clearfield County is reinstated.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
571 A.2d 377
Samuel H. CONOVER and Rebecca Conover, Husband and Wife, Respondents, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 27, 1990.
